summary: Pine view Retreat is a beautiful, medium-sized player home built for the Dragonborn just outside Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://mattandcassie.com/nexus/pr1.png[/img]


[b][size=4]Pineview Retreat
[/size][/b]

Welcome to Pineview Retreat, a home built for the Dragonborn. Your home is
located just outside the walls of Whiterun, surrounded by large pine trees
with an epic view of the mountains of Tamriel.

The exterior of your new home is outfitted with your own alchemy garden containing rare
ingredients, a chicken coop with plenty of eggs, a personal forge with plenty of material, a range with battle dummies, and
a garden filled with food for those long adventures.

The interior of your home has everything from an alchemy and enchanting room to a serene spa. It has a large kitchen with
a vast array of food, a dining room that can accommodate all of your guests, a beautiful bedroom
fit for a Kiin, and a magnificent Talos worship room. There is plenty to discover in this
medium-sized player home so explore and enjoy! 



[img]http://mattandcassie.com/nexus/pr2.png[/img]


[b][size=3]- Recommended Mods -[/size][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10556/?]Tyf-Es LOTR Rohirrim Whiterun Retext

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4259/?]Silly Level of Detail - Potions and Poisons -- SLOD PnP  by [b]Narmix[/b][/url][b][/b]


[b][size=3]- Requirements -[/size][/b]

Lastest Version of Skyrim

Dragonborn, Dawnguard, and Hearthfire


[b][size=3]- Installation -[/size][/b]

Installation should be used with Nexus Mod Manager


[b]~ If you enjoyed this mod, please feel free to endorse it, it's free! Thanks! ~
[/b]

[img]http://mattandcassie.com/nexus/pr3.png[/img][/center]
author: TOSOVNGARDE
